title: AppML Case Study - JSON Files

metadata.description: Learn about AppML Case Study - JSON Files with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
The HTML Page This is the HTML source: <

CD Collection

Extracted from a JSON text file

Title Artist Price
{{Title}} {{Artist}} {{Price}}
PHP » .NET » The Model This is the model used in the application: Model { "rowsperpage" : 7, "data" : { "type" : "jsonfile", "filename" : "cd_catalog.js", "record" : "cd", "items" : [ {"name" : "Title", "nodename" : "title"}, {"name" : "Artist", "nodename" : "artist"}, {"name" : "Price", "nodename" : "price"} ] } } The File This is the JSON file: cd_catalog.js { "cd" : [ { "title" : "Empire Burlesque", "artist" : "Bob Dylan", "price" : "10.90" }, { "title" : "Hide your heart", "artist" : "Bonnie Tyler", "price" : "9.90" }, { "title" : "Greatest Hits", "artist" : "Dolly Parton", "price" : summary: This tutorial covers AppML Case Study - JSON Files concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use AppML Case Study - JSON Files effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of AppML Case Study - JSON Files and how to apply it in your projects.
